00014 #ifndef U_MIME_ENTITY_H

00020 
00021 // UMimeEntity -- class representing a MIME entity
00022 //
00023 // RFC-2045 defines an entity as either a message or a body part, both of which have a collection of headers and a body
00024 //
00025 // MIME headers comprise a keyword followed by ":" followed by whitespace and the value.
00026 // If a line begins with whitespace it is a continuation of the preceeding line.
00027 // MIME headers are delimited by an empty line
00028 //
00029 // The only reliable way to determine the type of body is to access the Content-Type header field from the
00030 // headers object of the entity that contains it. For this reason, a body should always be part of a entity.
00031 // Only types "multipart" and "message" need to be parsed, and in all content types, the body contains a
00032 // string of characters
00033 //
00034 // If the content type is 'message'   then the body contains an encapsulated message
00035 // If the content type is 'multipart' then the body contains one or more body parts
00036 
00037 class UHTTP;
00038 class UMimeMultipart;
00039 
00040 class U_EXPORT UMimeEntity {
00041 public:
00042 
00043         // Check for memory error
00044         U_MEMORY_TEST
00045 
00046         // Allocator e Deallocator
00047         U_MEMORY_ALLOCATOR
00048         U_MEMORY_DEALLOCATOR
00049 
00050         UMimeEntity();
00051         UMimeEntity(const UString& _data, uint32_t startHeader = 0);
00052 
00053         UMimeEntity(UMimeEntity& item) : data(item.data), content_type(item.content_type), content(item.content)
00054                 {
00055                 U_TRACE_REGISTER_OBJECT(0, UMimeEntity, "%p", &item)
00056 
00057                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(item.header)
00058 
00059                 endHeader   = item.endHeader;
00060                 startHeader = item.startHeader;
00061 
00062                 // passaggio di consegne...
00063 
00064                 header      = item.header;
00065                                                   item.header = 0;
00066                 }
00067 
00068         ~UMimeEntity()
00069                 {
00070                 U_TRACE_UNREGISTER_OBJECT(0, UMimeEntity)
00071 
00072                 if (header) delete header;
00073                 }
00074 
00075         // VARIE
00076 
00077         UMimeHeader* getHeader() const { return header; }
00078 
00079         bool isEmpty()
00080                 {
00081                 U_TRACE(0, "UMimeEntity::isEmpty()")
00082 
00083                 bool result = content.empty();
00084 
00085                 U_RETURN(result);
00086                 }
00087 
00088         void setEmpty();
00089 
00090         bool parse();
00091         bool parse(const UString& _data)
00092                 {
00093                 U_TRACE(0, "UMimeEntity::parse(%.*S)", U_STRING_TO_TRACE(_data))
00094 
00095                 U_ASSERT(data.empty() == true)
00096 
00097                 data = _data;
00098 
00099                 (void) parse();
00100 
00101                 U_RETURN(parse_result);
00102                 }
00103 
00104         bool isParsingOk()
00105                 {
00106                 U_TRACE(0, "UMimeEntity::isParsingOk()")
00107 
00108                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(header)
00109 
00110                 U_RETURN(parse_result);
00111                 }
00112 
00113         UString getData() const                  { return data; }
00114    UString getBody() const        { return data.substr(endHeader); }
00115         UString getContent()    const            { return content; }
00116         UString getContentType() const { return content_type; }
00117         UString getMimeVersion() const { return header->getMimeVersion(); }
00118 
00119         // Content types: "multipart"   / [ "mixed", "alternative", "digest", "parallel", "signed", "encrypted", "report", "form-data" ],
00120         //                "message"     / [ "rfc822", "disposition-notification" ],
00121         //                "image"       / [ "jpeg", "gif" ],
00122         //                "audio"       / [ "basic" ],
00123         //                "video"       / [ "mpeg" ],
00124         //                "application" / [ "postscript", "octet-stream", "pgp-signature", "pgp-encrypted", "pgp-clearsigned",
00125         //                                  "pkcs7-signature", "pkcs7-mime", "ms-tnef", "x-www-form-urlencoded" ]
00126         //                "text"        / [ "plain" (RFC-1521), "richtext" (RFC-1341), "enriched", "html", "xvcard", "vcal",
00127         //                                  "rtf", "xml" ],
00128 
00129         bool isMime() { return header->isMime(); }
00130 
00131         bool isXML() const;
00132         bool isText() const;
00133         bool isPKCS7() const;
00134         bool isRFC822() const;
00135         bool isMessage() const;
00136         bool isMultipart() const;
00137         bool isURLEncoded() const;
00138         bool isApplication() const;
00139         bool isMultipartFormData() const;
00140 
00141         UString getCharSet() const                       { return UMimeHeader::getCharSet(content_type); } // get charset/content-type info
00142         UString shortContentType() const  { return UMimeHeader::shortContentType(content_type); }
00143 
00144         UString getValueAttributeFromKey(const UString& key, const UString& name) const
00145                 { return header->getValueAttributeFromKey(key, name); }
00146 
00147         bool isType(       const char* type, uint32_t len) const { return UMimeHeader::isType(       content_type, type, len); }
00148         bool isContentType(const char* type, uint32_t len) const { return UMimeHeader::isContentType(content_type, type, len); }
00149 
00150         // Disposition type (Content-Disposition header field, see RFC-1806): "inline", "attachment"
00151 
00152         UString getContentDisposition() const { return header->getContentDisposition(); }
00153 
00154         bool isAttachment() const
00155                 {
00156                 U_TRACE(0, "UMimeEntity::isAttachment()")
00157 
00158                 UString value = getContentDisposition();
00159 
00160                 bool result = (value.empty()                                                              == false &&
00161                                                         U_STRING_FIND(value, 0, "attachment") != U_NOT_FOUND);
00162 
00163                 U_RETURN(result);
00164                 }
00165 
00166         bool isBodyMessage() const
00167                 {
00168                 U_TRACE(0, "UMimeEntity::isBodyMessage()")
00169 
00170                 bool result = (isText()                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         &&
00171                                                         UMimeHeader::getValueAttributeFromKeyValue(content_type, *UMimeHeader::str_name, false).empty() &&
00172                                                         isAttachment() == false);
00173 
00174                 U_RETURN(result);
00175                 }
00176 
00177         UString getFileName() const { return UMimeHeader::getFileName(getContentDisposition()); }
00178 
00179         // retrieve information on specific HTML form elements
00180         // (such as checkboxes, radio buttons, and text fields)
00181         // as couple <name1>=<value1>&<name2>=<value2>&...
00182 
00183         uint32_t getNameValueFormData(UVector<UString>& name_value) const
00184                 {
00185                 U_TRACE(0, "UMimeEntity::getNameValueFormData(%p)", &name_value)
00186 
00187                 U_ASSERT(header->empty() == false)
00188                 U_ASSERT(content.empty() == false)
00189 
00190                 // Standard content type: "application/x-www-form-urlencoded"
00191                 // It may not be explicitly specified
00192 
00193                 U_ASSERT(content_type.empty() || isURLEncoded())
00194 
00195                 return UStringExt::getNameValueFromData(content, name_value);
00196                 }
00197 
00198         // read with socket
00199 
00200         bool readBody(USocket* socket);
00201         bool readHeader(USocket* socket);
00202 
00203         // STREAM
00204 
00205         friend ostream& operator<<(ostream& os, const UMimeEntity& e)
00206                 {
00207                 U_TRACE(0+256, "UMimeEntity::operator<<(%p,%p)", &os, &e)
00208 
00209                 os << *(e.header);
00210 
00211                 os.write(e.content.data(), e.content.size());
00212 
00213                 return os;
00214                 }
00215 
00216         // DEBUG
00217 
00218 #ifdef DEBUG
00219         const char* dump(bool reset) const;
00220 #endif
00221 
00222 protected:
00223         UMimeHeader* header;
00224         uint32_t startHeader, endHeader;
00225         UString data, content_type, content;
00226         bool parse_result;
00227 
00228         void clear()
00229                 {
00230                 U_TRACE(0, "UMimeEntity::clear()")
00231 
00232                 if (header)
00233                         {
00234                         startHeader = 0;
00235 
00236                         delete header;
00237                                          header = 0;
00238                         }
00239                 }
00240 
00241         bool checkContentType()
00242                 {
00243                 U_TRACE(0, "UMimeEntity::checkContentType()")
00244 
00245                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(header)
00246 
00247                 content_type = header->getContentType();
00248 
00249                 bool result = (content_type.empty() == false);
00250 
00251                 U_RETURN(result);
00252                 }
00253 
00254         void decodeBody();
00255 
00256 private:
00257         UMimeEntity& operator=(const UMimeEntity&) { return *this; }
00258 
00259         friend class UHTTP;
00260         friend class UMimeMultipart;
00261 };

00263 // If the content type is 'message' then the body contains an encapsulated message.
00264 
00265 class U_EXPORT UMimeMessage : public UMimeEntity {
00266 public:
00267 
00268         // COSTRUTTORI
00269 
00270         UMimeMessage(UMimeEntity& item) : UMimeEntity(item), rfc822(content)
00271                 {
00272                 U_TRACE_REGISTER_OBJECT(0, UMimeMessage, "%p", &item)
00273 
00274                 U_ASSERT(UMimeEntity::isMessage())
00275                 }
00276 
00277         UMimeMessage(const UString& _data) : UMimeEntity(_data), rfc822(content)
00278                 {
00279                 U_TRACE_REGISTER_OBJECT(0, UMimeMessage, "%.*S", U_STRING_TO_TRACE(_data))
00280                 }
00281 
00282         ~UMimeMessage()
00283                 {
00284                 U_TRACE_UNREGISTER_OBJECT(0, UMimeMessage)
00285                 }
00286 
00287         // VARIE
00288 
00289         UMimeEntity& getRFC822() { return rfc822; }
00290 
00291         // STREAM
00292 
00293         friend ostream& operator<<(ostream& os, const UMimeMessage& m)
00294                 {
00295                 U_TRACE(0+256, "UMimeMessage::operator<<(%p,%p)", &os, &m)
00296 
00297                 os << *(m.header) << m.rfc822;
00298 
00299                 return os;
00300                 }
00301 
00302         // DEBUG
00303 
00304 #ifdef DEBUG
00305         const char* dump(bool reset) const;
00306 #endif
00307 
00308 protected:
00309         UMimeEntity rfc822;
00310 
00311 private:
00312         UMimeMessage(const UMimeMessage&) : UMimeEntity() {}
00313         UMimeMessage& operator=(const UMimeMessage&)              { return *this; }
00314 };

00331 
00332                 U_ASSERT(UMimeEntity::isMultipart())

00335                 }

00359

00367                 U_ASSERT(_boundary.empty() == false)
00368

00370                 }

00379 
00380         uint32_t getNumBodyPart() const             { return bodypart.size(); }

00405                 {
00406                 U_TRACE(0, "UMimeMultipart::init()")
00407 
00408                 boundary = UMimeHeader::getBoundary(content_type);
00409 
00410                 (void) parse();
00411                 }
